summary.span: 包含用于定义常用值和引用数据类型、事件和事件处理程序、接口、特性和处理异常的基础类和基类。

span.span: Contains fundamental classes and base classes that define commonly-used value and reference data types, events and event handlers, interfaces, attributes, and processing exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其他类提供支持数据类型转换、方法参数操作、数学、远程和本地程序调用的服务、应用程序环境管理，以及托管和非托管应用程序的监督。Other classes provide services supporting data type conversion, method parameter manipulation, mathematics, remote and local program invocation, application environment management, and supervision of managed and unmanaged applications. 若要 从 c # 代码访问命名空间中的类型，而不必提供完全限定的类型名称，请 `using System;` 在源代码文件的开头包含语句。To access types in the namespace from C# code without having to provide fully qualified type names, include the `using System;` statement at the beginning of your source code file. 若要 从 c + +/cli 代码访问命名空间中的类型，而不必提供完全限定的类型名称，请 `using namespace System;` 在源代码文件的开头包含语句。To access types in the namespace from C++/CLI code without having to provide fully qualified type names, include the `using namespace System;` statement at the beginning of your source code file. 此外，必须用 [/clr](/cpp/build/reference/clr-common-language-runtime-compilation) 开关进行编译。In addition, you must compile with the [/clr](/cpp/build/reference/clr-common-language-runtime-compilation) switch.
